cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to a negative value (-1) will cause invalid port configuration and F1 interface failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_frequencyBand to an out-of-range value (999) will cause invalid frequency band configuration and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_frequencyBand 設定為超出範圍的值 (999)，會導致無效的頻率帶配置，並造成小區設定失敗。
